          <title>
            <string language="es">Aprovechamiento de las aguas subterráneas</string>
            <string language="en">Harnessing of subterranean water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorspannen des unterirdischen Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Armer de l'eau souterraine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aproveitarar da água subterranean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sfruttamento dell'acqua sotteranea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκμετάλλευση του υπόγειου ύδατος</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica la acción erosiva, de transporte y de sedimentación que produce un glaciar de tipo alpino.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the action of erosion, transport and sedimentation which an alpine glacier produces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">agua</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Tätigkeit der Abnutzung, des 
Transportes und der Sedimentbildung, die ein Alpengletscher, erklärt 
produziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant l'action de l'érosion, du 
transport et de la sédimentation qu'un glacier alpestre produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a ação da erosão, do 
transporte e do sedimentation que uma geleira alpine produz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega l'azione di erosione, di 
trasporto e della sedimentazione che un ghiacciaio alpino produce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί την ενέργεια της διάβρωσης, της 
μεταφοράς και της ιζηματογένεσης που ένας αλπικός παγετώνας 
παράγει.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
